title: Model-chan and Plain Manager
description:
This is the story of the daily lives of two women from different worlds. Yuria is a renowned model who can’t seem to resist protecting her manager—Okabe—from other guys making a move on her. Living in a romantic comedy, both hide what they feel for one another.

[hr][u][b]Spanish / Español:[/b][/u]
[spoiler]Esta historia relata la vida cotidiana de dos mujeres de dos mundos diferentes. Yuria es una modelo reconocida que no puede dejar de proteger a su manager, Okabe, de los hombres que intenta conquistarla. Ambas viven un amor de comedia, ocultando lo que sienten una por la otra.[/spoiler]
